title: 2 bed 1 bath condo high rise on water on edgewater
posting_body: Lake view,large 2 bedroom condo.stainless appliances, dishwasher,garbage disposal,indoor parking assigned,gym,pool,picnic grill area,key fob secured doors,speaker intercom system,live the life of luxury.walk to edgewater park and beach.sit on the rooftop deck.tenant pays no utilities or parking.
